isosensitivity: ISO 100 - 6400 in steps of 1/3 or 1/2 EV
poweroptions: - Optional MB-D15 multi-power battery pack - Nikon EN-EL15 Li-ion battery - Six AA alkaline, Ni-MH, or lithium batteries - EH-5b AC adapter, requires EP-5B power connector (available separately)
accessoriesincluded: - EN-EL15 rechargeable Li-ion battery (with terminal cover) - MH-25 battery charger - UC-E17 USB cable - AN-DC1 strap - DK-5 eyepiece cap - BS-1 accessory shoe cover - DK-23 rubber eyecup - BF-1B body cap
cleaning: - Image sensor cleaning - Image Dust Off reference data
